ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 568
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, it was the first MM battle drume I d EVER seen at auction.  And he wanted something in trade.  It was the only thing that I had he was remotely
ygData.messageBody:
Well, it was the first MM battle drume I'd EVER seen at auction. And he wanted something in trade. It
was the only thing that I had he was remotely interested in. It was relatively easy to get (the first
time). So I grudgingly went for it. Not like it really hampers me as a character to not have one. On
no, I may do on avg .5 points damage less per round. Heh.

Laluni Songhammer, Level 30 bard of E'Ci.

"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:

> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> ouch, i paid 3k for one for our in-game husband as a wedding gift, a month
> or two ago.
>
> Shada

> > Mistmoore Battle drum.
